[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Hero Section” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#1865e0″ background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_direction=”72deg” custom_padding=”70px|0px|70px|0px”][et_pb_row padding_top_1=”60px” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.83″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.89″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Poppins||||||||” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”56px” header_line_height=”1.3em” width=”100%” custom_padding=”|0px||||” animation_style=”fade”]

RECRUITMENT POLICY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.0.89″ text_font=”Poppins||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.8)” text_font_size=”18px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_padding=”||0px|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_delay=”100ms”]

We believe that systematic, transparent and ethical recruitment practice plays the important role of fulfilling the objectives and productivity of employers, workers recruiting agency and the entire supply chain.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.83″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/saklogo-copy.png” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ width=”90.3%” custom_padding=”|||||” animation_style=”fade”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/sak4.jpg” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ min_height=”408px” custom_padding=”||18px|||”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_divider color=”#4e5ed0″ divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Team Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.79″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”2px|||||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

RECRUITMENT POLICY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.24.1″]

Saint Arker Company believes that systematic, transparent and ethical recruitment practice plays the important role of fulfilling the objectives and productivity of employers, workers recruiting agency and the entire supply chain. At Saint Arker, our Management Team and employees are committed to ensure that we closely follow and comply with applicable ethical recruitment policy, code of conducts and international standards.

We strive to devote all reasonably practical resources into creating a responsible and ethical recruiting processes for all our employees, clients (employers), suppliers, sub-agents, workers, and any others who may be associated with our businesses.

We also strive to ensure that recruitments fees are reasonable, practicable and allowable by law and employers’ requirement. We will ensure that recruitment processes, contracts and benefits of workers are periodically reviewed to meet the legal or industry requirements throughout the recruitment.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding=”9px|||||” _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.24.1″]

We are also committed to ensure that charging recruitment fee to workers is strictly prohibited for supplying manpower to employers with “Employer Pays Principal” recruitment requirement.

We will also ensure that our recruitment procedures and guidelines are in placed prior to recruitment.

We are committed to ensure that we inform all candidates through job advertisement and interview process for they should not bear any other costs of recruitment and placement other than mutually agreed and allowable by law, if any fees have been levied, we will take necessary remedial action as soon as possible. We will also ensure that no worker pay a deposit or bond to secure the job.

We are committed to ensure that workers work safely in their workplaces and routine checks will be conducted to employers if applicable. The grievance mechanism will be implemented, and we shall provide applicable remediation between employers and workers if there are any disputes raised.

We are also committed to ensure that, our recruitment process and code of conduct include and not limited to anti-discriminations, no harassment, no humane treatment, no bribery, ethical recruitment, workers confidentiality, and no bonded or forced labor.

This policy will be reviewed annually to ensure that it remains relevant and appropriate to the organization.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/thai8.jpg” url=”#” use_overlay=”on” overlay_icon_color=”#ffffff” hover_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.55)” hover_icon=”%%3%%” align_tablet=”center” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” admin_label=”Project 01″ _builder_version=”3.24.1″ animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”left” animation_duration=”500ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” always_center_on_mobile=”on”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Email Subscribe” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#0c71c3″ background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(73,108,220,0.93)” custom_padding=”90px||60px|” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”4%”][et_pb_row background_position_1=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_width_px=”710px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.2″ background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” max_width=”100px” module_alignment=”center” height=”5px” custom_margin=”||20px|” custom_padding=”||20px|” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”bottom” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Title” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_font_size=”36px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Keep in Touch

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Request Section Subtitle” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” max_width=”710px” module_alignment=”center” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

If you have any queries about recruitments, vacancies, or anything else, our team is ready to response all your queries.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Footer” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_image=”https://www.recruitmentmyanmarsak.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/08/business-01.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_padding=”90px||90px|” saved_tabs=”all”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ custom_padding=”|||” make_equal=”on” background_color_1=”#ffffff” background_color_2=”#ffffff” background_position_1=”top_left” background_position_2=”top_left” background_repeat_1=”no-repeat” background_repeat_2=”no-repeat” padding_top_1=”50px” padding_top_2=”50px” padding_right_1=”40px” padding_right_2=”40px” padding_bottom_1=”50px” padding_bottom_2=”50px” padding_left_1=”40px” padding_left_2=”40px” _builder_version=”3.22.3″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″][et_pb_text admin_label=”Contact US Title” _builder_version=”3.0.78″ text_font_size=”16px” header_font=”Montserrat||||” header_text_color=”#1f1f1f” header_font_size=”22px” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]

Reach Us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%249%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ icon_placement=”left” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”28px” icon_font_size_last_edited=”off|desktop” admin_label=”Address” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ body_font_size=”16px” custom_margin=”|||” animation_style=”fold” animation_direction=”bottom” animation_intensity_fold=”20%”]
